bibl.title: The Market for Uncertainty Bearing in Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: I. Introduction: contracts for purchasing commodities in advance. - II. Advance sale in the Tetoueis archive. - III. Purpose of the advance sale contract. - IV. Advance sale contracts for wine and bilateral contracts. - Concluding remarks. - Avec résumé en anglais.

bibl.title: Bulletin of the Institute of Classical Studies [London]

bibl.seg: Morris Silver, The Market for Uncertainty Bearing in Roman Egypt.

I. Introduction: contracts for purchasing commodities in advance. - II. Advance sale in the Tetoueis archive. - III. Purpose of the advance sale contract. - IV. Advance sale contracts for wine and bilateral contracts. - Concluding remarks. - Avec résumé en anglais.
